`StaffingLevelOtherEmployeesEducation` BEHOORT NIET gerapporteerd te worden, omdat de gerapporteerde waarde van `Sector` gelijk is aan `mbo`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedStaffingLevelBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_Sector')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedStaffingLevelBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_Sector return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedStaffingLevelBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_StaffingLevelOtherEmployeesEducation')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_ContinuityParagraphConsolidatedStaffingLevelBreakdownEducation_PrtValueThnNoExistenceCovPU1_StaffingLevelOtherEmployeesEducation return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
